judul: Goddess of Abundance and the Genius Rogue Apostle
author: SeongGu (성구), 곰산타
synopsis: I beat the 0.0000001% odds and became an Apostle of the God of Abundance. Sounds like a farming god, right? …So why is my starter skill Decapitation? Chop off a head—boom, farming done. Process crops—boom, processed. It’s great… but how do I even explain this?
